EmailTemplate.name: 201905_Q3PricingUpdate_mih.201905_Q3PricingUpdate_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Catalog Pricing Updates Coming July 1, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Dear Customer,
Honeywell will update our Spares, Universal Flat Rate (UFR) and SPEX Exchange catalog pricing on select parts effective July 1, 2019. To view the published part numbers impacted by this pricing update, access the MyAerospace downloadable catalogs and filter on the column called ‘Revised List Price’.
To prevent order disruptions, please take the following actions:
- After June 1, 2019: Please access the updated pricing on Honeywell MyAerospace, EDI interfaces, and downloadable Spares, UFR, & SPEX catalog files.
- Effective July 1, 2019: Our new prices will be incorporated in MyAerospace On-Line Ordering and EDI interfaces. Please review the new pricing and apply it to all new purchase orders created on or after July 1, 2019. Also, please update your pricing system with the new pricing information.
The MyAerospace Portal <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com]]> is always available for your order management needs, including parts quoting, ordering, and tracking. View MyAerospace updates and tutorials here <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/contact-us/myaerospace-training]]>.
If you have any questions, please contact your Honeywell business focal.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/u/hq0pk0I00Q0000GnZ020XI0]]>
